function handler({
    api,
    event,

}) {

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-26 00:27:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>e53b3c6171bd0210a4b75a87515e32ce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setAdditionalDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DropshipNow" source="x_cdltd_dropship_0">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DropshipNow">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e53b3c6171bd0210a4b75a87515e32ce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-26 00:27:13</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
